Articles.Content:
I play on Xbox one using the radial preset.

I feel it’s only appropriate to send big orange tanks to space stations with a shuttle or skylon . But, i have yet to make a shuttle on my science save. I throttled up, pressed the staging and it lifted off beautifully. Then the SRBs popped off, taking the hydraulic detachment manifolds with them. Of course, the shuttle didn’t have the TWR to keep going and it plummeted back down into the VAB. I am now watching the srb spin it’s way to the south pole and wonder what just happened.

New info: it is only when I start to pitch or yaw to start a gravity turn that the SRBs come off. The main 5 meter tank is a bit wobbly too.

Never mind, Never mind! I found they gimbal their way off

Edited January 7, 2021 by The wizard of me
Solved
